name: FPSTutorial
description:
You are mercenary in the post apocalyptic era

Where the Earth is filled with monsters

Objectives:

1. Kill All Enemies

2. Don't Die

W / A / S / D / Space........................To Move

Left Mouse Button..........................To Attack

Num 1-4 / MouseWheel...............To Change Weapon(s)

Escape..................................................To Quit

"L"............................................................To Reload

Enter.......................................................To Start

credit:

Narayana Walters

BGM: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
